1.content:
Firstly, choose your character.

Lion- Lion is an adventurous boy who is very brave. He likes adventures and will not be afraid to be in one. However, he may not make the right decisions.

Claire- Claire is a super genius who is shy and quiet but Lion's best friend. She helps Lion make decisions.

Rockie- Rockie is Lion's irritating little brother who hates Lion and bugs him. He never fails to be a pain in Lion's neck. But for the adventure, he is at a dilemma at whether to believe Lion or not.

Ms Anna- Ms Anna is only twenty years old and she absoulutely adores thirteen years old Lion and Claire. She will help them many times; as many times as she can.

So who do you choose?
1.title: Choose your own character

choices: You choose to climb up to find the hole and Claire.
You know Claire is scared of everything and you'd be better on your own.
11.content:
You came to the Childrens' Home with Rockie since you were a three-year-old toddler. Rockie is three years younger than you. Your father died in a war while your mother died giving birth to Rockie. You consider Rockie bad luck. If it wasn't for him, you wouldn't have to be here.

But you have been left a golden key, your brother had not been left anything. Up till now, you have not known what is the use of it.

You met Claire when you were ten and you went to the Geo room (Claire named it that) with Claire everyday to play. One day, you found a hidden door.

You tried to open it but it wouldn't budge. You called Claire over. She studied it and said the key that was left for you by your parents is the key to open the door. You took out your key and slid it into the lock. You unlocked the door.

You saw Claire's hesitation to go in, so you slid inside down the ladder, knowing that Claire would follow after you. But Claire didn't. You looked up, you could not see the hole that once the door covered. You could only see the long ladder.
11.title: Climb up or don't care?

choices: You dive under the bush to hide.
You decide to stay and fight.
111.content: You couldn't find the hole once you reached the end of the ladder. The door was closed. You gave up and went down again. You were on your own now. You felt someone watching you. A shiver ran down your spine. You heard wicked laughter. You noticed a large and thick bush. You still have time to hide. But you are brave. Why not stay and fight?
111.title: Give up

1111.content:
You decide to hide. After all, you can attack him from the back when he was further away from you. Just then, you heard a sound. There were footsteps.

"You think he's here?" someone said.

You recognised that voice. It was Claire's. Will you go and meet her and risk being noticed by the guy with the evil laughter? Or will you stay hidden?
1111.title: You dive under the bush to hide.

11111.content:
You hoped that Claire will just go away. You don't want to risk her life or yours. But Claire's voice and footsteps were coming closer. Suddenly, you felt a cold hand brush against your cheek.
"Li-io-nn..." a whisper in your ear sent shivers down your spine. You are too scared to react.
"Li-io-nn..." that whisper again.
11111.title: Stay hidden.

choices: You went to her and knelt down beside her.
111112.content:
You were unable to stay cramped in the spot with a creepy voice behind you any linger. You got up and started to run. Suddenly you crashed into someone. Shrieks escaped from both of you and suddenly you were hugging each other.
"Lion!" Claire said, almost sobbing in relief. Rockie was standing to a side watching you. When your eyes met his, he looked down immediately, but he wasn't fast enough to hide that immense relief displayed on his face. A feeling which you couldn't name surged through you and you quickly shrugged it off, certain you had no time to be emotional.
"Li-io-nn..." That whisper again! You hadn't escaped it. Only this time, it wasn't just your name it chanted. "Cl-laire... Ro-ckk-iee..."
Claire spun around quicly, losing her balance. You reached out to grab her arm in time, and steadied her.
"What's that?" she whispered, her eyes wide with fear.
You shrugged. You didn't know. What you did know was this: You had to run for your lives. Or else... You didn't even wanted to think about it.
"RUN!" You shouted and all of you began to run for what seemed like an enternity. Running no where. Not even knowing if you were running in a circle. Claire collapsed, panting hard.
111112.title: You run for your life

112.content:
You heard a wicked laughter coming in your direction. There is still time to hide- in a large and thick bush near you.

But you are brave, do you want to stay and fight?
112.title: Fight? Or flight?

1122.content:
You decide to hide as you may not be strong enough to fight that-- whatever it is.
"Come out," it screeched. "Don't hide from me!"
Its voice sent shivers scuttling down your neck and you can feel your heart slamming against your ribcage your hands start feeling sweaty even though you are shivering.
"Come out," the voice seems to come from every direction.
At the corner of your eyes, you notice a path shrouded by trees. Escape.
Should you go there? You will risk getting noticed by the creature as there was just a small bit of the path not covered...
1122.title: You hide.

choices: You are afraid and decide not to go in, advising Lion to do the same.
You decide to go in as you are curious.
12.content:
On the day you arrived at the Childrens' Home, Ms Anna met you and liked you. She introduced you to Lion. You and Lion quickly became best friends.

Lion showed you a golden key. "This is all I have to remind me of my parents," he whispered.

You took pity on him as your father was still alive but did not have enough money to send me to acceralated classes that was necessary for you as you are a super genius. Nevertheless, he love you.

One day, you and Lion was playing in the Geo room. The Geo room was filled with old clothes and stuff that the Childrens' Home did not give away but they did not use the room either. You decided to call it Geo room. That is how it got it's name.

Lion uncovered a hidden door.

"Wow," he motioned for you to come over. "Look at this!"

"Hmm," you remebered seeing a key that could fit into this lock. Then you remebered. "Lion, the key that your parents give you, it can fit into the lock!"

"Wow!" he dug out the key and before you could stop him, he opened the hidden door. "Let's go in!"
12.title: Claire

choices: You went to Ms Anna and Rockie for help.
121.content:
"Lion, I think it will be dangerous," you advise. "Don't go in."

"Aww, come on, it will be an adventure. The Home's so boring. Don't you want a little excitement? Come with me!" Lion insisted. He slid into the hole and down the ladder. You didn't follow. A few minutes later, the door started to close on it's own. You screamed as you thought that there would be no way for Lion to come back out.

You hammered your fists on the door but it did not give way and open. You could not open the door as Lion had took the key with him.

You know something about picking locks. You wondered if you should picked the lock and open it or go and ask Ms Anna and Rockie to help as you were a person who was scared of almost everything.
121.title: You are afraid and decide not to go in, advisin...

choices: You went to Ms Anna and Rockie for help.
1211.content:
You found a paper clip. You picked the lock and the door swung open.

You looked down. It was dark below. You did not dare to go in on your own. You could not see the end to the long ladder or Lion anywhere.
1211.title: Ask for help

choices: You go on your own, hoping to find something
1212.content:
"What happened?" Ms Anna asked curiously.
"It's Lion," and you began to tell your story.
Ms Anna looked at you strangely. "This isn't some game you're playing right?"
1212.title: You went to Ms Anna and Rockie for help.

122.content:
You shakily crack open the door and glance back at Lion. "Hey, I think it's just a closet!"

Lion steps in as well and feels around for walls. "Claire? It doesn't feel like a closet." He gulps. "Are we going to..."

"The chances of that are one hundred eight-seven to one," you automatically assure him.

He stares at you like you're crazy (which you are... in a good way!).

And then the door slammed shut.
122.title: You decide to go in as you are curious.

choices: You try to open the door to get in for warmth
1221.content:
and find yourself shrouded in the dark. Your overactive imagination takes you on a wild rollercoaster ride and you imagine spooky noises. You shiver in fear.
"Lion?" you whisper, your voice quavering in fear. You know that he had came into the 'closet' with you but he seems to have disappeared. "Are you there?"
There is no reply. You think of the most sensible thing to do. Walk around and try to get out of here. You trudge in a certain direction and hear branches cracking under your feet.
Suddenly, the cold wraps its arms around you and you shiver. Then you saw a small light. You walk towards the light and find a cabin in front of you. The wind is stronger now.
1221.title: You climb deeper in...

12211.content:
You tug at the door. It was rusty and old so you expected it to be creaky at the very least. It opens smoothly, without a single sound, taking you by surprise, and you don't like surprises. Inside, a huge fire was roaring at the fire place. There was a grumble. You leap up, certain it's a monster. You have no sword or shield. You feel vulnerable. You are considering to run when you realize it's just your stomach.
There is an aroma of fresh bread and tea. Your stomach growls louder. You have to do something about it.
12211.title: You try to open the door to get in for warmth

choices: You choose to run out of here.
1222.content:
You turned around and tried to open the locked door behind you. It was locked.

"Oh no!" you cried.

"I guess we have to go on," Lion said, sounding as if he was shrugging. The both of you edged forward.

Finally, the both of you got out of the darkness.

"Like the Narnia, the Lion the Witch and the Wardrobe right?" Lion grinned.

You pretened to grimace. "That makes me the Witch."

"Huh?" Lion asked, stunned.

"You are the Lion, we have a Wardrobe so that leaves me as the Witch."

"Oh, I see," Lion smiled.

You two moved forward and finally reached the end of the small passage.

It was blocked.

"How do you open this?" Lion asked.

"Uh," you leaned against the wall and placed your hand on the decorative part.

The door slid open and you lost your balance. Lion grabbed hold of your elbow so that you didn't fall. You thanked Lion. Lion nodded then asked you if you wanted to go in.

Just then, you heard someone open the door which you came in from.
1222.title: Locked door

choices: What is this world? With all this grass everywhere....
12221.content:
You grabbed Lion's wrist and pinned both of yourselves against the wood side of the wardrobe.

A shimmer of light danced in and a young lady walked in. "Oh... oh!" she cried. Then she threw a look back over her shoulder.

"We need to leave," she whispered to you. "I don't know who you are, but unless you want to be chased by a Orthmog, we need to go."

"A Ortho-what?" Lion wanted to know.

"Now," the lady said. She grabbed you by the arm and led you to the far end of the wardrobe. The three of you all stepped through and slammed the door shut. Faded.... far away... you heard a scream and then a thunk.

"Closer," the lady hissed by way of explanation. Like that would help anything.
12221.title: Someone walks in: a big uh-oh!

122211.content:
"Where were we?" you demanded, trying to cover the fear rising up in her throat.

The lady glared at you. "Do you want it to find us?"

You kept your mouth shut.

The lady looked around. "Here... it won't be long before it finds us. It follows us by our scent. We need to get away from here." She tried to shift aside a boulder blocking our path and with the help of you and Lion, succeeded.

A dark path was revealed and the lady gestured for you to go in. Your heart started pounding.

"Don't worry," whispered Lion. "I'll keep you safe." He slid he hand into yours and together, the both of you started to walk.

"Faster!" the lady urged. "At this rate we will be dead soon!"

Then a thought struck you. What is a boulder doing in the middle of a wardrobe?

The path became narrow and low as branches hung low. Soon, there was only enough space for one.

"You'll have to go alone," the lady informed as if you couldn't see that. "I'll go in first, and you will follow," she jabbed her finger at you. She turned to Lion. "Come in after we shout for you."

She started walking and you followed behind her.

Dim light started shining in through the thick canopy of the low hanging trees and branches. Suddenly, the lady vanished. You looked around in fear, thinking you had lost her.

"Over here!" You turned around and saw her. She stood in front of a cave.

Relieved, you made your way over there, careful to avoid twigs. You reached her and she ushered you into the cave. The cave was mostly empty, and filled with glistening shells. You felt as if there was somebody watching you.

"It is time! She is here! Let us kill her and use her blood for our freedom!" The lady shouted. Several heavy-built man made their ways to you. They were armed with weapons ranging from arrows to swords. You were unarmed, how could you fight them all?

There was only two choices now, you could hide, or you could run. Not being brave, both options seemed a lot to you. You knew you were wasting time but what could you do?
122211.title: What is this world? With all this grass everywh...

choices: You decided that you don't care anymore about him.
13.content:
You hate your older brother. But somehow, you love him at the same time too. He is the closest you can ever get to saying family. You don't like the way he treats you. You want him to treat you better. But what can you do other than stick around him to grow closer to him? He considers you being irritating. Actually, you're not. You just want to grow closer to him. You don't really have friends. I mean, Claire's nice, but she is not what you can call a friend. You stuck around your older brother, now, you've no friends, but your brother doesn't really care about you.

You find out that your brother is missing.
13.title: Disappear?

131.content:
Just then, Claire comes running up to you.

"I need your help," she pants, breathlessly. "Your brother..."

"Disappeared? Yeah I know," You reply.

"I know where he had disappeared to. But you have to come with me. I can't go alone. It's spooky."

"Yeah, great. You're older than me. You're spooked out. Why shouldn't I be?"

"Rockie, he's your brother. You got to help him."

"And I was just about to," you sigh. "Come on, show me where he went."

"I need to find Ms Anna first."

"Let's go, what are we waiting for? Christmas?"

Claire smiles briefly. "Christmas is not that long away."

We went to find Ms Anna. Ms Anna was at her office. But she didn't believe a single word we said.

"Well then," Claire sighs dejectedly. "I guess it's just the two of us."

She leads you to the a small open door. "Lion went inside here."

I looked in. "I can't see him."

"I know, that's why we have to find him," Claire said. "Will you go in?"

"I... yeah, I guess I will. I'm not as brave as my brother you know," you say.

Claire took my hand. "Let's go in together."
131.title: Helping Lion

choices: You reached the other end of the ladder with Claire.
132.content:
You felt bad about deciding that but you shook that thought away.

Just then, Claire found you. She told you she knew where your brother was.

You lied that you were just about to find him.

Claire wanted to find Ms Anna and ask her to help you and her. You agreed. When you found Ms Anna, Claire told Ms Anna the same thing she told you. Ms Anna didn't believe you two. Claire sighed dejectedly. "Guess it's just the two of us."

You went to the open door with Claire.

You held hands with Claire and slid into the hidden but open door together.
132.title: Rescue

choices: You decide to go and check it out.
You decide that they are kids and just playing.
14.content: You like both Lion and Claire. You kind of wish that they are your kids. You hope that when you grow older a little more, you can adopt them. But you found out that Lion was missing. You didn't know about Claire.
14.title: Check it out

info.brief_description: Lion noticed a hidden door in the Children's Home. He enters and find that it is a portal.
info.description: It is about a thirteen year old boy, Lion on a mission to save his parents- once he found out that they were not dead. But they are under a sleeping spell. Can Lion save them?
